title: Pucks!
description: Coach Lyman is determined to turn this hockey team into a winning club.
quote: There’s more to me than just my puck.
creator: Sean Lincoln, Beverly Lincoln
altHero: Matt LeBlanc is Coach Lyman with his hockey team on the ice
alt1: Lyman talks with a young player in the locker room
alt2: Lyman talks with another player in the locker room
alt4: James Michael Tyler as an opposing team’s coach
